thread.title: Janaina Cattan

author: Janaina Cattan
title: Janaina Cattan
text: I had recently bought the hemp oil drops 1500 mg and it works very well. The only concern is that it burns the back of my throat. It's very painful for me and I'm not sure if this is normal. I had requested to speak to someone through email about this and no one returned my email. I just wanted to know if this was something that happens. Other than that the product works.
